name: Ale
body:
# Ale

Smart shell for more productive work.

You can search in Google, Amazon, Google Maps, Youtube, Yahoo, Wolfram etc. from ale: ale> google apple ale> amazon book ale> youtube eminem You can open applications from ale: ale> App Store ale> Mail You can open Gmail, Twitter, Google Drive from ale: ale> gmail You can also empty trash, remove files etc.: ale> emptytrash ale> remove document Found a bug? Have an awesome idea? Please open an issue on this github page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
